channel.title: Moparscape Error
channel.description:
I can't run Moparscape and it closes after it starts up. This is the java version I have and I CANNOT change it so what do I edit the runMoparscape file.
This is the information I have atm [code]@echo off title Running Bot java -noverify -Xmx500m -cp .;./MoparScape.jar; Bot 0 ::param 0 for highmem, 1 for lowmem, another 0 to make the song not startup pause[/code][br][size=1]Posted at: November 30, 2006, 08:05:56 AM[/size][hr]Mmk

@Aces316rocks wrote:

I can’t run Moparscape and it closes after it starts up. This is the java version I have and I CANNOT change it so what do I edit the runMoparscape file.

This is the information I have atm

@echo off title Running Bot java -noverify -Xmx500m -cp .;./MoparScape.jar; Bot 0 ::param 0 for highmem, 1 for lowmem, another 0 to make the song not startup pause[br][size=1]Posted at: November 30, 2006, 08:05:56 AM[/size][hr]Mmk
